title: Successful User Sign Up and Sign In
description: Verify that a new user can sign up with valid credentials and then sign in successfully with those credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to sign up page
Input valid user details and submit sign up form
Check that sign up completes successfully and user is redirected to sign in
Navigate to sign in page
Input registered user credentials and submit sign in form
Check that sign in is successful and dashboard is loaded
Validate that user session persists across page reloads

title: Failed Sign In With Invalid Credentials
description: Verify the system prevents sign in with invalid username or password and shows appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to sign in page
Enter incorrect username and/or password
Click sign in button
Verify that an error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials
Verify the user is not logged in or redirected to dashboard

title: Natural Language Lead Search - Basic Query
description: Verify that inputting a natural language query returns relevant SMB leads within 2 seconds.

steps.description: Navigate to Dashboard and locate the search input
Input a simple natural language query such as 'tech startups in San Francisco'
Validate that search results are returned in under 2 seconds
Verify leads are relevant based on query context and lead scoring is displayed

title: Natural Language Lead Search - Complex Query with Filters
description: Verify natural language queries combined with advanced filters apply correctly and results update accordingly.

steps.description: Enter a complex natural language query like 'small businesses with annual revenue > $1M in New York'
Apply advanced filters such as industry and lead score thresholds
Check that search results match both query intent and filter criteria
Ensure results update dynamically and response time remains under 2 seconds

title: Lead Scoring - Real-time Updates and Custom Profiles
description: Validate that lead scoring updates in real time when changing scoring profiles and based on engagement factors.

steps.description: Select a set of leads from search results
Change the lead scoring profile to an industry-specific custom profile
Verify lead scores are recalculated and displayed immediately
Trigger an engagement event (e.g., viewing lead detail or adding notes)
Verify lead score and qualification status update accordingly in real time

title: Lead Detail Panel Interaction
description: Verify the lead detail panel displays comprehensive information and supports notes, tags, status updates, and lead assignment.

steps.description: Open detail panel for a selected lead
Confirm display of business signals, contact info, website analysis, and AI insights
Add a note and apply a tag to the lead
Verify that note and tag are saved and visible in the panel
Change lead status and assign to a team member
Check that status and assignment updates persist and reflect in all relevant views

title: Multiple UI Views - Dashboard, Table, Kanban Board
description: Verify navigation and interaction across the three main UI views, ensuring real-time updates and proper functionality.

steps.description: Navigate to Dashboard home view and verify metric displays
Switch to Table view and validate virtualized grid with multi-select and scoring visualization
Perform bulk operation such as updating lead status
Confirm bulk operation applies successfully and updates are shown in real time
Navigate to Kanban Board view and drag a lead card between status columns
Ensure drag-and-drop updates lead status correctly and reflects across views

title: Search History and Saved Searches Functionality
description: Verify that search queries are tracked in history, and saved searches can be named, tagged, re-run, and deleted.

steps.description: Perform multiple distinct search queries
Verify search history displays recent queries with timestamps and performance metrics
Save a search with a custom name and tags
Confirm saved search appears in saved searches list with correct metadata
Re-run a saved search and verify that results match saved query parameters
Delete a saved search
Check that saved search is removed from the list and no longer accessible

title: Export Lead Data in Multiple Formats
description: Validate export functionality for CSV, JSON, and styled Excel formats with user-selected data fields.

steps.description: Apply filters to narrow down leads
Open export dialog and select CSV format with specific fields
Download exported file
Verify the CSV file contains correct data and formatting
Repeat export for JSON format with another set of selected fields
Validate JSON file structure and data accuracy
Repeat export for styled Excel format
Check Excel file produces correct styling and includes chosen data fields

title: Advanced Filtering Reliability and Performance
description: Verify that complex filter combinations apply correctly, update search results in real time, and maintain persistent state.

steps.description: Select multiple filter criteria including industry, revenue range, location, and lead score
Validate search result updates dynamically and response time is under 2 seconds
Save filter set
Check that saved filters can be retrieved and re-applied correctly
Reload the page and verify filters and results persist

title: Collaboration Features - Shared Searches and Lead Assignment
description: Validate shared searches are accessible by team members and lead assignments update across user sessions.

steps.description: Create and share a saved search with a team member
Confirm team member can view and execute the shared search
Assign a lead to a team member
Verify that assignment is updated for both users and visible in respective dashboards

title: Theme Management - Light/Dark Mode Toggle and System Detection
description: Verify that the application supports switching between light and dark modes, respects system theme preferences, and persists user settings.

steps.description: Observe application theme picked based on system preference on initial load
Manually toggle between light and dark modes via the theme switch
Verify UI updates correctly to chosen theme
Reload the application
Confirm selected theme persists after reload

title: Security - Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that different user roles have correct permissions and cannot access unauthorized routes or functionalities.

steps.description: Login as a user with limited permissions
Attempt to access admin-only views or perform restricted actions
Verify access is denied with an appropriate message or redirection
Login as an admin user
Verify admin routes and operations are accessible and functional

title: Error Handling - API Failures and Network Issues
description: Validate the system displays user-friendly error messages and recovers gracefully from backend API failures or network interruptions.

steps.description: Simulate API failure or timeout during lead search execution
Verify an informative error message appears and search input remains usable
Simulate network disconnection during data export
Confirm user is notified of the issue and no corrupted files are downloaded

title: Performance - Virtualized Table and Kanban Board Responsiveness
description: Confirm that UI components with large data sets perform efficiently with smooth scrolling and drag-drop without lag.

steps.description: Load table view with over 1000 leads
Verify virtual scrolling works smoothly without freezing or long delays
Navigate to board view with large number of lead cards
Drag and drop a card between status columns
Confirm drag-drop operations are fluid and state updates correctly

title: Compliance - GDPR and Data Encryption Verification
description: Validate the application enforces data privacy compliance including user consent and secure data encryption at rest and in transit.

steps.description: Review sign up and data handling flows for explicit user consent prompts
Ensure system does not proceed without required consent
Inspect data stored in database for encryption
Verify that sensitive data fields are encrypted
Monitor network traffic during app usage
Confirm data is transmitted using secure protocols (e.g., HTTPS, encrypted websocket)

title: AI-Powered Lead Insights Accuracy and Relevance
description: Verify the AI-generated insights offer personalized, relevant recommendations and update dynamically with lead data changes.

steps.description: Select a lead and view generated AI insights
Verify insights are relevant to lead business signals and engagement history
Modify lead data input (e.g., add a note or update tag)
Check AI insights refresh and reflect updated lead context

title: Session Management and Protected Route Access
description: Verify authenticated sessions persist securely and unauthorized users are redirected away from protected areas.

steps.description: Authenticate as a valid user
Navigate through multiple protected routes
Verify access is granted without repeated authentication
Logout from the system
Attempt to access protected routes directly via URL
Confirm user is redirected to sign in page
